output_questions.question: Red text
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph text is colored red using a named color.

output_questions.question: Green heading
output_questions.explanation: The heading is colored green using a hexadecimal color value.

output_questions.question: Blue background
output_questions.explanation: The div's background is blue using an RGB color value.

output_questions.question: Dark gray
output_questions.explanation: The span text is dark gray using a short hexadecimal color code.

output_questions.question: Half-transparent red
output_questions.explanation: The heading has a semi-transparent red background using RGBA.

output_questions.question: HSL blue
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph text uses HSL to set the color to blue.

output_questions.question: Transparent green background
output_questions.explanation: Green background with 30% opacity using HSLA.

output_questions.question: Yellow text
output_questions.explanation: Hex shorthand `#FF0` is equivalent to yellow.

output_questions.question:
<style>
body {
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #f00, #00f);
}
</style>
<body>Gradient</body>
output_questions.explanation: The background is a horizontal gradient from red to blue.

output_questions.question: Orange heading
output_questions.explanation: RGB values for orange are used for the heading.

output_questions.question: Black on white
output_questions.explanation: Text is black, background is white using hex codes.

output_questions.question: Custom color
output_questions.explanation: A custom 6-digit hex color is used.

output_questions.question: Aqua background
output_questions.explanation: The background is set to aqua using RGB.

output_questions.question: Blue with alpha
output_questions.explanation: Hex with 8 digits includes alpha (opacity), resulting in a semi-transparent blue background.

output_questions.question: Invisible text
output_questions.explanation: The text is rendered invisible by setting its color to transparent.
